languages.text: "Вы знаете, что тем поселениям, которые не могут в срок отдать положенные подати, разрешено платить людьми? На них даже есть заказы — то старики, то дети..." {n}Он понижает голос до шепота и подается к вам.{/n} "Я видел этих людей. Я видел, как их доставляют в усадьбу... и больше о них ни слуху ни духу. Они исчезают в потайных комнатах, Ваша Светлость. Навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Вы знаете, что тем поселениям, которые не могут в срок отдать положенные подати, разрешено платить людьми? На них даже есть заказы — то старики, то дети...". {n}Он понижает голос до шепота и подается к вам.{/n} "Я видел этих людей. Я видел, как их доставляют в усадьбу... и больше о них ни слуху, ни духу. Они исчезают в потайных комнатах, Ваше Благородие. Навсегда".

languages.text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."
languages.original_text: "Вы знаете, что тем поселениям, которые не могут в срок отдать положенные подати, разрешено платить людьми? На них даже есть заказы — то старики, то дети..." {n}Он понижает голос до шепота и подается к вам.{/n} "Я видел этих людей. Я видел, как их доставляют в усадьбу... и больше о них ни слуху ни духу. Они исчезают в потайных комнатах, Ваша Светлость. Навсегда".

They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

languages.text: 「納税の義務を果たせなかった開拓地は、税を免除する代わりに住民を差し出しているのをご存知ですか？しかも、注文がくることも…時には老人が、時には子供が…」{n}男は声を潜めあなたに寄りかかる。{/n}「こうした人々の行く末を知っています。屋敷に連れて行かれるのを見ましたが…それ以来、二度と姿を見なければ声を聞くこともありません。秘密の部屋の中へと入り、再び出てくることはないのです、陛下。これまで誰一人も」
languages.original_text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

traits.locale_text: 「納税の義務を果たせなかった開拓地は、税を免除する代わりに住民を差し出しているのをご存知ですか？しかも、注文がくることも…時には老人が、時には子供が…」{n}男は声を潜めあなたに寄りかかる。{/n}「こうした人々の行く末を知っています。屋敷に連れて行かれるのを見ましたが…それ以来、二度と姿を見なければ声を聞くこともありません。秘密の部屋の中へと入り、再び出てくることはないのです、陛下。これまで誰一人も」

languages.text: “您知道吗？那些没有按时缴纳什一税的定居点，那里的人都被带走抵税了。他们甚至会按照订单交货，有的时候是老人，有的时候是孩子们……” {n}他靠了过来，声音宛如耳语一般。{/n}“我见过那些人，我亲眼看到他们被带到了庄园里……之后我就再也没听说过那些人了。他们被送进了密室，就再也没出来过，大人。他们就那么消失了。”
languages.original_text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

traits.locale_text: “您知道吗？那些没有按时缴纳什一税的定居点，那里的人都被带走抵税了。他们甚至会按照订单交货，有的时候是老人，有的时候是孩子们……” {n}他靠了过来，声音宛如耳语一般。{/n}“我见过那些人，我亲眼看到他们被带到了庄园里……之后我就再也没听说过那些人了。他们被送进了密室，就再也没出来过，大人。他们就那么消失了。”

languages.text: «¿Sabía que permite a los asentamientos que no pueden pagar sus diezmos a tiempo pagar con personas? Las piden a medida, además: a veces son niños, a veces, ancianos...». {n}Baja la voz hasta convertirla en un susurro y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «He visto a esa gente. He visto cómo la llevaban a la mansión... y sé que nunca se la vuelve a ver. Las meten en salas secretas de las que ya no salen, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nunca».
languages.original_text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabía que permite a los asentamientos que no pueden pagar sus diezmos a tiempo pagar con personas? Las piden a medida, además: a veces son niños, a veces, ancianos...». {n}Baja la voz hasta convertirla en un susurro y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «He visto a esa gente. He visto cómo la llevaban a la mansión... y sé que nunca se la vuelve a ver. Las meten en salas secretas de las que ya no salen, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nunca».

languages.text: "Wusstet Ihr, dass die Ansiedlungen, die ihren Zehnt nicht rechtzeitig begleichen, stattdessen mit Menschen bezahlen dürfen? Sie liefern sogar nach Bedarf – manchmal Alte, manchmal Kinder ..." {n}Er beugt sich zu dir und flüstert:{/n} "Ich habe diese Menschen gesehen. Ich habe gesehen, wie sie zum Anwesen gebracht wurden ... und seitdem sind sie spurlos verschwunden. Sie gehen in geheime Räume und kommen nicht mehr heraus, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Niemals."
languages.original_text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

traits.locale_text: "Wusstet Ihr, dass die Ansiedlungen, die ihren Zehnt nicht rechtzeitig begleichen, stattdessen mit Menschen bezahlen dürfen? Sie liefern sogar nach Bedarf – manchmal Alte, manchmal Kinder ..." {n}Er beugt sich zu dir und flüstert:{/n} "Ich habe diese Menschen gesehen. Ich habe gesehen, wie sie zum Anwesen gebracht wurden ... und seitdem sind sie spurlos verschwunden. Sie gehen in geheime Räume und kommen nicht mehr heraus, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Niemals."

languages.text: « Saviez-vous que les colonies qui ne paient pas leurs taxes à temps sont désormais en droit de s'en acquitter en êtres humains ? Il arrive même qu'ils soient livrés sur commande : parfois des vieux, parfois des enfants... J'ai vu ces gens, Votre Seigneurie, {n}continue-t-il à voix basse en se penchant vers vous.{/n} Je les ai vus arriver au domaine... puis ils ont disparu sans laisser de trace. On les conduit dans des salles secrètes dont ils ne ressortent jamais. Jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

traits.locale_text: « Saviez-vous que les colonies qui ne paient pas leurs taxes à temps sont désormais en droit de s'en acquitter en êtres humains ? Il arrive même qu'ils soient livrés sur commande : parfois des vieux, parfois des enfants... J'ai vu ces gens, Votre Seigneurie, {n}continue-t-il à voix basse en se penchant vers vous.{/n} Je les ai vus arriver au domaine... puis ils ont disparu sans laisser de trace. On les conduit dans des salles secrètes dont ils ne ressortent jamais. Jamais. »

languages.text: "Aşarlarını zamanında ödemeyi başaramayan yerleşim yerlerinin borçlarını insanlarla ödeyebildiklerini biliyor muydunuz? Hatta onları sipariş üzerine teslim ediyorlar. Bazen ihtiyarlar oluyor, bazen çocuklar." {n}Sesini alçaltıp fısıltıyla konuşmaya başlıyor ve sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "O insanları gördüm. Konağa teslim edildiklerini gördüm. Ardından da onları bir daha ne gören oldu ne duyan. Gizli odalara giriyor, bir daha da çıkmıyorlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Asla çıkmıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Did you know that the settlements that fail to pay their due tithes on time have been allowed to pay with people instead? They even deliver them to order — sometimes old folks, sometimes children..." {n}He lowers his voice to a whisper and leans toward you.{/n} "I've seen those people. I've seen them being delivered to the estate... and then they're never seen or heard from again. They go into the secret rooms and they don't come out again, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever."

Bazen ihtiyarlar oluyor, bazen çocuklar." {n}Sesini alçaltıp fısıltıyla konuşmaya başlıyor ve sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "O insanları gördüm. Konağa teslim edildiklerini gördüm. Ardından da onları bir daha ne gören oldu ne duyan. Gizli odalara giriyor, bir daha da çıkmıyorlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Asla çıkmıyorlar."
